feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.4.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Bug] Separate CheckInternetConnection from GetExternalIpAddress by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2120
  • [Feature] Add events for speedtest benchmark failed and passed by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2106

What's Changed

  • [Chore] Make tinker a dev requirement by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2104
  • [Chore] Update pull request template to include documentation link seâ€¦ by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2122
  • Release v1.4.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2132

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.4.1 (French and Traditional Chinese Translations)
entry.content:
What's New

  • Add a basic zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2135
  • Added basic french translation by @selbiselbi in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2137

What's Changed

  • [QoL] Add issue and request templates by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2140
  • [QoL] Add bot for stale issues by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2141
  • Release v1.4.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2144

New Contributors

  • @PeterDaveHello made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2135
  • @selbiselbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.4.2
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Add Error Message to the results table & Export by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2151

What's Changed

  • [Chore] Added code of conduct and updated labels by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2147
  • Release v1.4.2 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2152

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • Added allowed IPs by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2160

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Published database config and added DB_SEARCH_PATH as env variable by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2157
  • Release v1.5.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.6.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • Run Speedtests from the API by @alexjustesen and @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2204

What's Changed

  • [Chore] Add Composer and NPM to dependabot by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2166
  • Add german (de_DE) localization by @daFailer in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2190
  • [Feature] Add Ping and server data to results by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2195
  • 2025-05-08 dependency updates by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2196
  • [Chore] Update template and Bot by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2188
  • Added workflow permissions and updated days and labels by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2199
  • [Bug] Fix server selection during manual test runs by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2176
  • [Feature] Write Failed tests to influxdb by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2200
  • [Feature] Sent actual data in webhook test by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2202
  • Removed unused dependency timokoerber/laravel-one-time-operations by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2205
  • Refactored running speedtest process by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2206
  • Fixed run speedtest server id input by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2207
  • Removed unused InteractsWithSockets trait from event classes by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2208

New Contributors

  • @daFailer made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2190

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0
